definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
(bird species of China) striated bulbul (Pycnonotus striatus)
(bird species of China) little owl (Athene noctua)

sentences.english: I think that the absence of streaks above should also support identification as Styan's.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲體上缺乏縱紋應該也是比較支持是史氏蝗鶯。

sentences.english: Two front pockets in bias cut.
sentences.chinese: 前胸袋口以縱紋剪裁造出斜格效果。

sentences.english: The head is whitish with some fine streaking restricted to nape.
sentences.chinese: 頭部全白，僅有一些侷限於後頸的纖細縱紋。
